spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Ayo's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC  17, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Ayo's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Ayo can use its Tail Whip twice.

action.name: Tail Whip
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage

action.name: Aerial Slash (3/Day)
entries: The Ayo whips the air with its tail, slashing through targets in a 30-foot cone. Each creature the Ayo or Paul chooses must make a Dexterity saving throw equal to its spell save DC. On a failed save, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) slashing damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Wild Shape (2/Day)
entries: As an action, the Ayo can magically assume the shape of any beast or fey. The Ayo follows the Wild Shape table, except the maximum CR it can transform into is 2.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The metal giant is immune to any spell or effect that would change its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance (Silver Only)
entries: The metal giant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Silvered (Silver Only)
entries: The clobber and smash attacks count as silvered weapons if your metal giant is made out of silver.

trait.name: Siege Metal (Adamantine Only)
entries: The metal giant deals double damage to objects and structures and its attacks count as adamantine weapons.

trait.name: Fly (Mithral Only)
entries: The metal giant gains a 80 foot fly speed.

trait.name: Swim (Gold Only)
entries: The metal giant gains a 80 foot swim speed.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The metal giant makes two attacks per action using its clobber and/or smash attacks.

action.name: Clobber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) bludgeoning damage and the metal giant can push the target up to 20 feet away from it as part of the attack

action.name: Smash
entries: The metal giant smashes one of its feet into a space on the ground within 20 feet of it. Any creature in a 20-foot-radius of that space must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 40 ({@dice 8d10}) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Until the metal giant uses its smash again or moves, any creature under its foot is restrained. While restrained in this manner, any creature under the metal giant’s foot can use its action to make a DC 20 Strength check. On a success, any creature that passes the check can relocates to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the metal giant’s foot and is no longer restrained. Structures, as well as any nonmagical objects that are neither being worn nor being carried, take the same amount of damage if they are in the space that the metal giant has smashed and placed its foot over (no save).

action.name: Disintegration Ray (1/Day)
entries: As your action, the metal giant can fire a ray of energy in a 100-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in the line of the ray must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 60 ({@dice 11d10}) force damage on a failed save, or no damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by the ray is disintegrated, leaving only magical items behind if they were carrying any at the time.
